talents.option1: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

talents.option2: +10 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies

abilities.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.notes: The shared damage type is the same as the type of damage inflicted.

abilities.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
abilities.name: Shadow Word

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to [10, 12, 14, 16] seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3.0 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.notes: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.

abilities.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives [60, 60, 60] seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.notes: This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
